messages.message:
Yeah the slowness is purely caused by frontend performance issues, so a HAR file won't be that helpful for debugging

hmm the Build project shouldn't be that slow if it has 52 files though

@Armaan it seems the page gets slower a minute or two after the Build project is openeded, so could you ask the customer the following?
• Can the user provide a screen recording of the page getting slower after 1-2 minutes?
• The screen recording should show this as well, but what actions were performed? What was the user trying to do with this set of actions?
I would also generally recommend avoiding the results table if the page is very slow (see screenshot)

the feature request for moving features by drag-and-drop is tracked here (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-2249)

however, clearly the frontend slowness issues are higher priority
